\w The|strong="H5375"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w were|strong="H5288"\w* crushing \w the|strong="H5375"\w* grain, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w boys|strong="H5288"\w* \w were|strong="H5288"\w* falling \w under|strong="H3782"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8179"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w men|strong="H0970"\w* \w are|strong="H8179"\w* no longer seated in \w the|strong="H8179"\w* doorway, \w and|strong="H2205"\w* \w the|strong="H8179"\w* \w music|strong="H5058"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H8179"\w* \w young|strong="H0970"\w* \w men|strong="H0970"\w* has come \w to|strong="H8179"\w* an end.

\w The|strong="H2015"\w* \w joy|strong="H4885"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* our \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* ended; our \w dancing|strong="H4234"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w changed|strong="H2015"\w* \w into|strong="H2015"\w* sorrow.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* been taken \w from|strong="H5307"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: sorrow \w is|strong="H7218"\w* ours, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* are sinners.

\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* feeble; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w dark|strong="H2821"\w*;
